channel.title: Series on Guillermo Alfaro
channel.description: Recent content in Series on Guillermo Alfaro

item.title: Solving an old physics problem
item.description: A couple of days ago, I found my old physics books and decided to remember the good ol’ days and while doing so, I found a problem I proposed for the Salvadoran Physics Olympiad and wanted to share the solution. I will try my best to properly translate from Spanish it to English.
